name: Office Hours (Nicholas Nakano, Chris Yoon, Leon Yang, Matthew Lawrence)
name_original: Office Hours (Nicholas Nakano, Chris Yoon, Leon Yang, Matthew Lawrence)
description:
Escape from a day at the office and try not to strain your eyes.

Tip: Look around too much and you will lose sanity.

Move: WASD Look: Mouse Open Eyes: Spacebar Interact: E
